Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Mike Krukow (NYG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1985, off Dave Wehrmeister (TOR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1985, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/15/1986 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/27/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
Injured on 5/1/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/28/1989: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $1,260,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 4/3/1992 to a minor league deal...
